author: Snazzy Labs
description:
Apple’s hardware is almost universally phenomenal, but the software is as frustrating as ever.

Apple’s 2025 lineup delivered exceptional hardware—the M5 MacBook Pro and M4 MacBook Air are class-leading, while iPhone Air, iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and even the budget iPhone 16e all impressed—but software tells a different story. macOS Tahoe shipped buggy and visually inconsistent, Liquid Glass divided users with questionable design choice
title: Why Apple’s Great Year Doesn’t Feel Great
